info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 3:40PM MST until July 30 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 340 PM MST, Earlier heavy rainfall over the area from Golden Valley to Oatman Road resulted in guage reports between 0.5 and 1.5 inches. Flash flooding is ongoing and has resulted in impassable roads in parts of Golden Valley. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Golden Valley and Oatman Road FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
